thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Culp Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Culp Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Culp Inc:
* CULP ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 * Q3 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.42
* Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q3 SALES ROSE 12 PERCENT TO $85.3 MILLION * PRE-TAX INCOME FOR Q4 OF FISCAL 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $7.0 MILLION TO $7.6 MILLION
* PRE-TAX INCOME FOR FULL YEAR IS EXPECTED TO BE $27.4 MILLION TO $28.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
